duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the Lease Administration for the company's real estate portfolio, ensuring timely and accurate rent payments and collection of tenant rent.
Review and provide guidance on complicated agreements and legal documents escalated by the team, as well as any account issues or disputes.
Act as the subject matter expert of the lease module and lease administration’s tests of controls.
Drive continuous improvement of work efficiency and performance through a culture of innovation.
Manage and track lease inventory and billings to support the lease administration team, and review monthly rent and receivables for the portfolio.
Effectively communicate trends, outcomes, and complex management reports using business acumen and analytical ability.
Train others on lease administration and financial systems, manage key interfaces and interdependencies, and make recommendations for enhancements to lease administration and financial systems.

Assess the business value and efficiency of the work performed, identifying and implementing improvements, and initiating or leading increasingly complex department projects and continuous improvement activities.
Foster the development of direct reports through effective coaching, development planning, and shaping of assignments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree required, minimum of 5 years of finance or real estate experience
